name: Fishing Craze
summary: Catch a boatload of fishy fun in Fishing Craze, an arcade challenge! Load up the RV and crisscross the country in a series of tournaments that will put your angling prowess to the test. Catch fish to earn points and climb to the top of the rankings in the amateur, pro, and elite circuits, but watch out for surprises swimming just below the surface that will slow you down.
